comments.author: jruderman@gmail.com
comments.text:
This assertion might have helped us catch bug 679375 earlier.

See also bug 477432, asking for a static analysis.
comments.creator: jruderman@gmail.com

comments.author: khuey@kylehuey.com
comments.text: This seems like the kind of thing that we should make a runtime abort, because third party code could hit it.
comments.creator: khuey@kylehuey.com
